survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Digital Banking App Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on the usability, features, and overall satisfaction with our digital banking app to guide future improvements.

questions.question_text: How often do you use our digital banking app?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure frequency accurately.

script.question_text: How often do you use our digital banking app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify high-usage features.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the app's user interface? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the app's user interface? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in our digital banking app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in our digital banking app?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend our digital banking app to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge net promoter sentiment.

script.question_text: Would you recommend our digital banking app to others?
